trends: There have been no other sightings in Boiling Springs
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Mettalic in color, shaped like a cigar with a large rudder near each end
divs: sighting detailsdec 5, 2007 i was taking a break outside on our back porch and gazing up at a mostly blue sky with a few thin cloud formations a few miles off to the southeast. the cloud formation was fairly low, perhaps 2,000 feet off the ground. i noticed the cloud formation appeared oddly shaped. there was a semi circle of clear blue sky cut right through the middle. the swath of blue sky appeared to be at least 20-30 feet wide and the diameter was approximately ��� mile. it resembled someone taking a paint brush and painting the blue sky semi-circle through the thin layer of cloud. i was wondering what could cause it and it was a fairly windy day. i noticed what at first appeared to be a plane approximately 200 feet below the cloud layer moving steadily off to the west. from my position it appeared somewhat large for a plane at that distant. i mean it would have taken a softball sized object to obscure it from my view. that would make it appear at least 4 inches long from my position. i would estimate the object being 75-100 ft long. since it looked out of place\oddly shaped, i concentrated on it for a few seconds. it was a metallic in color that shown brightly in the afternoon sun. it gave off no noise nor did it display a vapor trail. it had what appeared to be a rudder both forward and aft. since it was moving steadily to the west, it was moving out of sight due to the roof overhang. i got up from my chair and walked about 6 feet down the steps to get a more prolonged, clear, view. there was nothing but clear blue sky in the direct the object was moving. when i got down the steps (only about 5 seconds later) the object was gone! i mean if it had been a plane it would surely be flying steadily west toward the afternoon sun. what was real odd was the cloud with the semi-circle and the fact the object disappeared from its fairly slow flight into clear blue sky.
